com.wit.and.widget.adapter

Class BaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.wit.and.widget.adapter.BaseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OptBaseAdapter

    public abstract class BaseAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter

    public abstract class

    BaseAdapter

    extends BaseAdapter

    Class Overview

    Updated BaseAdapter for better handling of using the adapters.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
